name: smelf run
description:
a few weeks ago I red the RPG book "low life: rise of the lowly" by andy hopp, it depicted strange and wonderful creatures and immediately sparked my imagination.

one of the races in the book - the smelf is a kind of dwarf that has the special ability to hover by inflating his nose. 

kind of as a joke, I started working on this game  - a game where you  play as a smelf and can move vertically by inflating your nose. 

use arrow keys or WASD to move around, jump on enemies and try not to die.

and this is it now, polished and nice, even featuring an online leaderboard - I made the art and programming, and my friend made the background art, you can check him out here: https://www.instagram.com/ayal_art

I had a lot of fun working on this project and even tho it was quit simple programming wise learned a lot.

ty!

"Still Pickin" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
